name: growled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
growl
to make a low, rough sound, usually in anger: The dog growled at her and snapped at her ankles. [ + speech ] "Not now, I'm busy," he growled. Compare
grumble verb
rumble verb (SOUND)
